view

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.image.ImageView
        • view.Piece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Piece
extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
    Represents a piece on the game board. Holds the piece's image, type, team, location on the board, whether or not the piece has been revealed by the enemy player, and the team of the active player. These values can be set and retrieved by the provided methods.

    • Method Detail

      • loadGraphic

        private void loadGraphic()
        Load the graphic that represents this piece. This class extends a Node for the graphic of the piece, which can be changed to something else if the pieces use a different graphic (e.g. ImageView).

        public void setRevealed(boolean revealed)

        Parameters:
